title: Reinterpretace srpna 1968 jakožto procesu vzpomínání a zapomínání
title_eng: Re-interpretation of august 1968 as an process of remembering and forgeting
author: Hana
Skoumalová
keywords: The main goal of this work is to analyse the representations of August 1968 in Czechoslovak Socialistic Republic through media discourse in years 1968

1978 and 1988 and identify how the discourse was generated during this period and determine what representations in different disoursive strands have been juset and changed. The main research method is critical discoursive analysis by Jäger enriched by dispozitive analysis which let the author to investigate the theme throught discoursive and non-discoursive actions and the knowlede which do they contain. The analysis will be done in through media disourse which was separeted in three strands
samizdat and exil. In the analysis will be mainly analysed the official strand and samizdat strand

the exil one will be used only complementarily according to the topic of the work. The main outcome is the identification of representations fo August 1968 and intepretation and categorization with the use of socioloigcal theoretical concepts such as
cultural trauma and national myths. The research will follow tesese questions
Are in the analysied print reprezent the events of August 1968 and if yes how? How discoursive strands differentiate one from each other? How have discoursive strands changed during studyed period?
